text: Dang tianshimen rang zi qi zhe siwang shi, tamen [tianshi] shuo:“Nimen shengqian de qingkuang ruhe?” Tamen shuo:“Women zai dadishang shi bei qiya de.” Tamen [tianshi] shuo:“Nandao an la de da di hai bugou kuankuo, gong nimen zai qizhong qianyi [bing bi kai qiya] ma?” Zhexie ren de guisu que shi huo yu. Guisu zhen elie!
